name: The Devil (cathroon, Aaron Taecker-Wyss, flan, Nic, shane yach, bb tombo)
name_original: The Devil (cathroon, Aaron Taecker-Wyss, flan, Nic, shane yach, bb tombo)
description:
You're a lifter; a transient worker picked up by a gargantuan concrete colony vehicle, the Spire.

Traversing the swamp on pilgrimage, your Spire has halted its journey. Someone has gone overboard. The herd continues on without you, as the people call to their God for help.

But it isn't their God that answers.

///

WASD/Arrows  --  Move

C/J  --  Talk/Interact

X/K (hold)  --  Sprint

back + X/K  --  Quickturn 

Z/L  --  Aim Gun

aim + C/J  --  Fire Gun

aim + X/K  --  Reload Gun

///

CHEATS:
F5  --  Unlimited Health
F6  --  Unlimited Ammo
F7  --  Get/Repair Gun
F9  --  Delete Save (restart game for changes to take effect)

///

Made by:

Aaron Taecker-Wyss (@TaeckerWyss)

bb Tombo (@bbtombo)

Catherine Brinegar (@cathroon)

Flan Falacci (@thatkidflan)

Nic Freeman (@NonFatalDrop)

Shane Yach (@tipsheda)

A SlugHuman Production

Made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Spooks gamejam.

(NOTE: The MacOS build is not notarized and  will not work on its own with MacOS v10.15 Catalina unless following some roundabout instructions as seen here.)
